After kneading [[chakra]] in the stomach and converting it into water, the user spews it out as a high pressure stream that is powerful enough to cut cleanly through the roots of the [[God Tree]] with ease.

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, when Tobirama was first [[Summoning: Impure World Reincarnation|reincarnated]], he used a technique similar in appearance to this one. By manipulating the water around him, he was able to fire high-pressure jets of water powerful enough to easily cut through rock.
